articles.title: Three injured in accident at Changi airport - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A person was trapped at the driver's seat of a bus following an accident at Changi Airport on Wednesday (Sept 22).
articles.content:
SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A person was trapped at the driver's seat of a bus following an accident at Changi Airport on Wednesday (Sept 22).

articles.title: Don't buy Chinese phones, throw them away if you have, Lithuania says - AsiaOne
articles.description: Lithuania’s defence ministry recommended that consumers avoid buying Chinese mobile phones and advised people to throw away the ones they have now after a government report found the devices had built-in censorship capabilities. Flagship phones sold in Europe…

articles.title: Hong Kong quietly widens national security law with subtle shift - The Straits Times
articles.description: Lawyers said the shift could expand the reach of a government crackdown on dissent in the Asian financial hub.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: HONG KONG (BLOOMBERG) - Hong Kong has quietly broadened the language it uses to describe national security violations, a shift lawyers said could expand the reach of a government crackdown on dissent… [+4657 chars]

articles.title: This new cat cafe in the East has adorable kitty meringue biscuits and a cute owner to boot - AsiaOne
